item.title: 中国 11 月汽车销量延续跌势 创 10 个月最大降幅
item.description: 周一的数据显示，中国 11 月份汽车年销量下降 8.5%，连续第二个月下降，创下 10 个月来的最大降幅。【原文：China's annual car sales dropped 8.5% in November in a second straight monthly decline, for their biggest fall in 10 months, data showed on Monday, amid a waning scramble to buy vehicles before government subsidies dwindle at year-end.】

item.title: Gartner 表示，只有少数汽车制造商将继续推动人工智能发展
item.description: 周一发布的一份研究报告显示，只有少数几家汽车公司有可能在未来几年持续进行雄心勃勃的人工智能投资，这让人怀疑目前的行业 "亢奋 "是否会带来持久的效益。【原文：Only a handful of automotive companies are likely to sustain ambitious artificial intelligence investment in the coming years, a study released on Monday showed, raising doubts over whether current industry "euphoria" will deliver lasting benefits.】

item.title: 中国 11 月汽车销量跌幅扩大
item.description: 由于政府补贴减少，前期购车带来的提振作用逐渐减弱，11 月份中国汽车销量同比下降 8.5%，这是连续第二个月下降。【原文：China's car sales dropped 8.5% in November from a year earlier, the second straight monthly decline, as the boost from a front-loading of purchases faded due to dwindling government subsidies.】

item.title: 野村与全球券商一道预测美联储本周降息
item.description: 野村（Nomura）预计，美国联邦储备委员会将在本周的政策会议上降息，与全球同行一道，在鸽派信号的影响下，扭转此前对央行维持利率不变的预期。【原文：Nomura expects the U.S. Federal Reserve will deliver an interest rate cut at this week's policy meeting, joining global peers in reversing their earlier expectations of the central bank holding rates amid dovish signals.】

item.title: Magnum 冰淇淋在阿姆斯特丹上市，估值 91 亿美元
item.description: 马格南冰淇淋公司的股票周一的交易价格为每股 12.8 欧元，这意味着该公司的市值达到 78.4 亿欧元（91.4 亿美元），因为该公司最终完成了期待已久的从联合利华分拆上市的工作，并将在阿姆斯特丹上市。【原文：Shares in the Magnum Ice Cream Company traded at 12.8 euros per share on Monday, implying a market capitalisation of 7.84 billion euros ($9.14 billion), as the company finalised its long-awaited spinoff from Unilever to list in Amsterdam.】

item.title: 英美资源集团在泰克合并投票前撤回高管薪酬决议
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American）周一表示，在投资者对其与加拿大泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）合并的政策表示担忧后，该公司已从股东投票中撤回了一项改变执行董事奖金奖励的提议。【原文：Anglo American said on Monday it had withdrawn a proposal to change executive directors' bonus awards from a shareholder vote on its merger with Canada's Teck Resources , after investors raised concerns about the policy.】

item.title: 不插电的圣诞节澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令带来假期精神压力
item.description: 悉尼少女艾里斯-托尔森（Ayris Tolson）认为，在澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令下，她的第一个暑假开始时会相对轻松，因为她有时间与家人在一起。【原文：Sydney teenager Ayris Tolson believes the start of her first summer holiday under Australia's youth social media ban will be relatively easy as she spends time with family, but as the weeks drift by, she fears being alone and isolated.】

item.title: 对非美国市场销售强劲，中国出口超出预期
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收令人望而却步的高额关税，中国制造商加深了与世界其他地区的贸易联系，在此推动下，中国 11 月份的出口额超过了预期。【原文：China's exports topped forecasts in November, driven by a surge in shipments to non-U.S. markets as manufacturers deepen trade ties with the rest of the world in light of President Donald Trump's prohibitively high tariffs.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，IBM 接近以约 110 亿美元收购 Confluent
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，IBM 正在就以约 110 亿美元的价格收购数据基础设施公司 Confluent 进行深入谈判。【原文：IBM is in advanced talks to acquire data infrastructure company Confluent for about $11 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 礼来公司的蒙加罗被列入中国国家医保糖尿病治疗目录
item.description: 国家医疗保障局周日在其网站上发布公告称，礼来公司的畅销药物 "蒙加罗 "将从 1 月 1 日起纳入中国的国家医疗保险计划，为 2 型糖尿病患者提供治疗。【原文：Eli Lilly's popular drug Mounjaro will be added to China's state-run health insurance scheme from January 1 for patients with type 2 diabetes, the National Healthcare Security Administration said in a website notice on Sunday.】

item.title: Robinhood 收购经纪公司和加密货币交易商，进军印尼市场
item.description: Robinhood Markets 将收购印度尼西亚经纪公司 Buana Capital Sekuritas 和持牌数字资产交易商 Pedagang Aset Kripto，这标志着该零售交易平台将进入东南亚主要加密货币中心之一。【原文：Robinhood Markets will acquire Indonesian brokerage firm Buana Capital Sekuritas and licensed digital asset trader Pedagang Aset Kripto, marking the retail trading platform's entry into one of Southeast Asia's major crypto hubs, the company said in a blog post on Sunday.】

item.title: 美元在美联储会议前找到立足点
item.description: 美元在经历了两周的抛售后于周一企稳，本周央行会议密集，其中以美国联邦储备局会议为首。【原文：The U.S. dollar steadied on Monday after two weeks of selling, ahead of a week crammed with central bank meetings and headlined by the U.S. Federal Reserve, where an interest rate cut is all but priced in but a divided committee makes for a wild card.】

item.title: 美联储倒计时，亚洲股市情绪谨慎
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市犹豫不决，投资者押注美联储本周将降息，但这次会议可能是近期最不稳定的会议之一，一些决策者公开反对宽松政策。【原文：Asian shares dithered on Monday as investors bet the farm on a rate cut from the Federal Reserve this week, yet the meeting could be one of the most fractious in recent memory with some policy makers openly arguing against an easing.】

item.title: 受美国降息预期和地缘政治风险影响，油价维持在两周高位
item.description: 油价周一徘徊在两周高位，因为投资者预期美联储本周降息将提振经济增长和能源需求，同时也在关注威胁俄罗斯和委内瑞拉石油供应的地缘政治风险。【原文：Oil prices hovered at two-week highs on Monday as investors expect a Federal Reserve interest rate cut this week that will lift economic growth and energy demand while eyeing geopolitical risks that threaten oil supplies from Russia and Venezuela.】

item.title: 特朗普称将参与审查 Netflix 与华纳兄弟的交易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日表示，他将对 Netflix 和华纳兄弟（Warner Brothers）之间的合并提议是否应继续推进有发言权，他告诉记者，合并后实体的市场份额可能会引发担忧。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday that he would have a say whether a proposed merger between Netflix and Warner Brothers should go forward, telling reporters the market share of a combined entity could raise concerns.】

item.title: 调查显示：欧洲首席执行官不看好欧洲，青睐美国投资
item.description: 周日公布的一项调查显示，欧洲大型企业的首席执行官们对欧洲的经济前景持悲观态度，尽管与六个月前相比有所缓和，但他们更看好在美国的投资。【原文：Chief executives of large European companies are downbeat on Europe's economic prospects, albeit less so than six months ago, and have become more bullish about investing in the U.S. than at home, according to a survey published on Sunday.】

item.title: 独家报道：联合利华施压，Ben & Jerry's 董事会主席不打算辞职
item.description: Ben & Jerry's独立董事会主席表示，由于联合利华在周一公开分拆 Magnum 冰淇淋部门之前向她施压，她没有辞职的打算。【原文：The chair of Ben & Jerry's independent board said she has no plans to resign as Unilever pressures her ahead of Monday's public spinoff of its Magnum ice cream division, which will include the Vermont-based brand.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德-通用投资公司（Brookfield-GIC）斥资 26.5 亿美元收购澳大利亚国家仓储公司（National Storage），创下历史新高
item.description: 澳大利亚国家仓储房地产投资信托基金（National Storage REIT）周一表示，已同意由布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）和新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）支持的财团提出的 40 亿澳元（26.5 亿美元）收购要约，推动其股价创下历史新高。【原文：Australia's National Storage REIT said on Monday it has agreed to an A$4 billion ($2.65 billion) takeover offer by a consortium backed by Brookfield Asset Management and Singapore's GIC, propelling its shares to a record high.】

item.title: 财政部长贝森特表示已剥离其大豆农场
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）是实施唐纳德-特朗普总统包括关税在内的经济议程的关键人物，他于周日透露，他最近已剥离了自己在一家大豆农场的权益，以遵守他去年一月加入政府时签署的道德协议。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, a key figure in implementing President Donald Trump's economic agenda including tariffs, disclosed on Sunday that he has recently divested his interests in a soybean farm to comply with the ethics agreement he signed last January when he joined the administration.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，布鲁克菲尔德和 GIC 接近就 National Storage 提出具有约束力的收购要约
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日援引知情人士的话报道，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）和新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）正接近就国家仓储房地产投资信托基金（National Storage REIT）提出具有约束力的收购要约，这笔交易可能会使这家在悉尼上市的公司估值达到约 40 亿澳元（约合 26.5 亿美元）。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management and Singapore’s GIC are nearing a binding offer for National Storage REIT in a deal that may value the Sydney-listed company at about 4 billion Australian dollars ($2.65 billion), Bloomberg News reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国航空公司要求在 Spirit 破产程序中发出通知
item.description: 据一份法院文件显示，美国航空公司在精神航空破产程序中提交了出庭通知，并要求接收所有已送达的通知和文件。【原文：American Airlines filed a notice of appearance in Spirit Aviation bankruptcy proceedings and requested to receive all notices and papers served moving forward, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 据 SonntagsBlick 报道，瑞银集团可能在 2027 年前再裁员 10,000 人
item.description: 瑞士报纸《SonntagsBlick》周日报道称，瑞银集团可能在 2027 年前再裁员 1 万人，但未说明从何处获得的信息。【原文：UBS may cut an additional 10,000 jobs by 2027, Swiss paper SonntagsBlick reported on Sunday, not citing where it obtained the information.】

item.title: 马斯克否认太空探索技术公司估值 8000 亿美元的报道
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克周六驳斥了媒体关于 SpaceX 正在以 8000 亿美元估值筹集资金的报道，称这些报道并不准确。【原文：Elon Musk on Saturday dismissed media reports that SpaceX is raising funds at an $800 billion valuation, calling them inaccurate.】

item.title: 波音称特朗普的股权计划不适用于美国大型国防企业
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划让政府参股战略产业，但波音公司国防部门负责人周六表示，这一计划不适用于大型国防企业。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's plan to take government equity stakes in strategic industries doesn't apply to major defense firms, the head of Boeing's defense unit said Saturday.】

item.title: 美国免除西南航空公司因 2022 年假期崩溃而被处以的 1100 万美元罚款
item.description: 特朗普政府周六表示，将免除对西南航空公司处以的 1100 万美元罚款，作为就该航空公司 2022 年 12 月在繁忙的假日旅游期间发生故障而达成的 1.4 亿美元和解协议的一部分。【原文：The Trump administration said Saturday it will waive an $11 million fine imposed on Southwest Airlines as part of a $140 million settlement over the carrier's meltdown in December 2022 during a busy holiday travel period.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，印度和美国调查人员将于下周就印度航空坠机事件举行会议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六报道，印度将于下周派遣调查人员前往美国，与美国国家运输安全委员会一起查看6月份印度航空公司致命空难的相关数据。【原文：India will send investigators to the United States next week to go over data gathered on the deadly Air India flight crash in June with the National Transportation Safety Board, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 独家报道：飞行员工会阻止 Allegiant 航空公司为外籍员工申请美国居留权
item.description: Allegiant 航空公司的飞行员工会正在阻止该公司为数十名来自智利、澳大利亚和新加坡的外籍飞行员争取永久居留权的努力，从而使他们的移民身份和公司的人员配置陷入困境。【原文：Allegiant Air's pilots' union is blocking the airline's attempt to secure permanent residency for dozens of foreign pilots from Chile, Australia and Singapore, leaving their immigration status - and the company's staffing - in limbo.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官表示，到 2030 年将投资 1,860 亿美元
item.description: 大众汽车集团首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）表示，大众汽车集团计划到 2030 年投资 1,600 亿欧元（1,860 亿美元），这反映出这家欧洲顶级汽车制造商在中国和美国这两个关键市场面临重大危机时正在勒紧裤腰带。【原文：Volkswagen Group plans to invest 160 billion euros ($186 billion) through 2030, its CEO Oliver Blume said, reflecting belt-tightening as Europe's top automakers faces a major crisis in its two key markets, China and the United States.】

item.title: 巴西罗布斯塔咖啡种植者在价格上涨和气候问题的背景下努力提高咖啡质量
item.description: 在圣保罗高尚的奥斯卡-弗莱雷大道上一家别致的咖啡店里，咖啡师在喧闹声中端起一杯非典型浓缩咖啡。这杯咖啡口感特别细腻，散发着可可碎屑的香气，但却缺乏用最好的阿拉比卡咖啡豆制作的咖啡所特有的酸味。【原文：Amid the din of a chic coffee shop on Sao Paulo's posh Oscar Freire Avenue, a barista pulls an atypical espresso. Extra creamy, with an aroma of cocoa nibs, the shot lacks the hallmark acidity prized in coffee made from the finest arabica beans.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，Advent 10 亿美元收购惠而浦印度股份的交易谈判破裂
item.description: 四位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，全球私募股权公司 Advent International 拟以高达 10 亿美元的价格收购美国巨头惠而浦印度分公司的谈判因估值分歧而破裂。【原文：Global private equity firm Advent International's talks to acquire U.S. giant Whirlpool's India unit for up to $1 billion have collapsed due to disagreements over valuation, four people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】
